special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
[b]4 Defense[/b] Stage 2
You may play land cards from the top of your library.
[b]2 Defense[/b] Stage 3
You may cast creature spells from the top of your library.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 4
Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {2} less to cast.
